short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: e4U allows you to support Ukraine’s reconstruction effort for free each time you shop online in more than 1700 online stores.
short.pl: Dzięki e-commerce for Ukraine (e4U) możesz bezpłatnie pomagać i wspierać Ukrainę przy okazji zakupów online.
short.uk: Завдяки e-commerce for Ukraine (e4U) можеш безкоштовно допомагати та підтримувати Україну, просто купуючи онлайн.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
e4Ukraine: Help for Ukraine. Free for you.  

The e4U browser plugin allows you to support Ukraine’s reconstruction effort for free each time you  shop online. You pay what you usually do while more than 1700 online stores share their revenue with NGOs working towards Ukraine’s reconstruction.

The extension’s two main functionalities are:
1. displaying information with the amount of support (a % of what you spend) on the e4U partner's website: when entering the website, you will see a message allowing you to enable support with just one click
2. displaying in search results the amount of support offered by the store 

The e4U browser plugin does not display any ads and doesn’t collect or share any user information (except analytics anonymous data). 

You will select the cause for your donations to be added to after installation.

See more at e4ukraine.org
